mapper.insert: INSERT INTO temp_file ( user_id, session_id, unique_id, image_type, file_name, content_type, file_base64, created_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{sessionId}, #{uniqueId}, #{imageType}, #{fileName}, #{contentType}, #{fileBase64}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, session_id AS sessionId, unique_id AS uniqueId, image_type AS imageType, file_name AS fileName, content_type AS contentType, file_base64 AS fileBase64, created_at AS createdAt FROM temp_file WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND session_id = #{sessionId} AND unique_id = #{uniqueId} AND image_type = #{imageType}
